title: Beautiful, bright, renovated 1 Bedroom 1 Bath
posting_body: Beautiful 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment with renovated kitchen and bathroom in Lower Nob Hill within walking distance to Financial District, Union Square, Polk Street, Chinatown and North Beach.
This apartment  has beautiful wooden floors and every room in this apartment has windows.
The living room and bedroom look out into the courtyard and you will feel like you are nestled in the suburbs when you're home while only steps away from many restaurants, and shops.
I am looking for someone to sign a 1 year lease starting September 1.
There is a coin-op laundry room within the building, access to the rooftop with a patio, gated entrance with the ability to buzz visitors and delivery into the building.
If you are interested and cannot make the available open house dates, please contact me and we can work something out for viewing.
